channel.title: Smart Contracts on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Smart Contracts on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
AdEx Network (ADX) Logo AdEx Network describes itself as a new-generation solution aiming to address and correct some of the most prominent inefficiencies of the online advertising industry. AdEx originated in 2017 as a decentralized ad exchange and subsequently evolved into a full protocol for trading of advertising space/time and the subsequent verification and proof of ad delivery. It covers all interactions between publishers, advertisers and end users. AdEx Network works through micropayments on Ethereum by utilising the OUTPACE layer 2 payment channels, and offers DeFi staking of its native ADX token.
You can download theAdExlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: AdEx
item.description: AdEx Network describes itself as a new-generation solution aiming to address and correct some of the most prominent inefficiencies of the online advertising industry. AdEx originated in 2017 as a decentralized ad exchange and subsequently evolved into a full protocol for trading of advertising space/time and the subsequent verification and proof of ad delivery. It covers all interactions between publishers, advertisers and end users. AdEx Network works through micropayments on Ethereum by utilising the OUTPACE layer 2 payment channels, and offers DeFi staking of its native ADX token.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
bZx Protocol (BZRX) Logo The bZx protocol is an Ethereum-based decentralized platform built for DeFi lending and margin and leverage trading that differentiates itself from competitors through a smart contract-powered token system. Launched in 2018, offers two types of financial primitives, iTokens and pTokens, through its Fulcrum and Torque DeFi platform. BZx’s trading front-end Fulcrum allows users to trade and or lend crypto assets through tokenized loans (iTokens) and tokenized positions (pTokens). Torque serves as bZx’s lending front-end web interface, allowing users to borrow funds for any purpose at a fixed interest rate.
You can download thebZxlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >

BZx’s trading front-end Fulcrum allows users to trade and or lend crypto assets through tokenized loans (iTokens) and tokenized positions (pTokens). Torque serves as bZx’s lending front-end web interface, allowing users to borrow funds for any purpose at a fixed interest rate.

Gas (GAS) Logo Gas is a token created on the NEO blockchain platform with primary purpose of being fees for processing transactions on the NEO network. Source
You can download theGaslogo on full-version of the page. ]] >

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Kin (KIN) Logo
The Kin cryptocurrency is used as money within a digital ecosystem of consumer applications and services. It was initially launched as an ERC20 token on the Ethereum blockchain, and was designed to be the main currency in the Kik messenger ecosystem. Kik had initially launched a rewards points system, not a cryptocurrency, called Kik Points that ended in 2017. Kin is short for Kinship, since its aim was to strengthen ties within the Kik community.
You can download theKinlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >

Kin is short for Kinship, since its aim was to strengthen ties within the Kik community.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Revain (REV) Logo Revain is an online platform for Ethereum blockchain-based tokens reviews, designed to allow developers to receive constructive feedback about their projects. The protocol also incentivizes authors to provide high-quality reviews. Revain was the first platform to combine the features of traditional review sites and blockchain technology. Revain’s ultimate goal is to create a legitimate and genuine feedback structure for all global products and services that utilize emerging technologies, such as machine learning and blockchain.
You can download theRevainlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Revain
item.description: Revain is an online platform for Ethereum blockchain-based tokens reviews, designed to allow developers to receive constructive feedback about their projects. The protocol also incentivizes authors to provide high-quality reviews. Revain was the first platform to combine the features of traditional review sites and blockchain technology. Revain’s ultimate goal is to create a legitimate and genuine feedback structure for all global products and services that utilize emerging technologies, such as machine learning and blockchain.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Serum (SRM) Logo Serum is a decentralized exchange (DEX) and an ecosystem that brings high speed and low transaction costs to decentralized finance (DeFi). It is permissionless and is built on the Solana blockchain. Serum was created to eliminate the vulnerabilities in the current DeFi space that exist due to incomplete decentralization. It is claimed to be fully decentralized and runs on a non-custodial exchange with cross-chain trading support and no know your customer (KYC) requirements.
You can download theSerumlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Serum
item.description: Serum is a decentralized exchange (DEX) and an ecosystem that brings high speed and low transaction costs to decentralized finance (DeFi). It is permissionless and is built on the Solana blockchain. Serum was created to eliminate the vulnerabilities in the current DeFi space that exist due to incomplete decentralization. It is claimed to be fully decentralized and runs on a non-custodial exchange with cross-chain trading support and no know your customer (KYC) requirements.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Utrust (UTK) Logo Utrust (UTK) was designed to provide a solution to the problems resulting in low usability of cryptocurrency as means of payment, particularly the underdeveloped transactional security of payment platforms and relatively high fees. The main goal of the platform is to build a system that will enable fast and seamless crypto transactions at lower fees, therefore allowing merchants to reach a large audience of crypto holders. The platform allows buyers to make secure purchases while also offering an option for refunds and protecting sellers from the high volatility of the crypto market.
You can download theUtrustlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Utrust

The main goal of the platform is to build a system that will enable fast and seamless crypto transactions at lower fees, therefore allowing merchants to reach a large audience of crypto holders. The platform allows buyers to make secure purchases while also offering an option for refunds and protecting sellers from the high volatility of the crypto market.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
VeChain (VET) Logo VeChain (VET) is a blockchain-powered supply chain platform. Begun in 2015 and launched in June 2016, VeChain aims to use distributed governance and Internet of Things (IoT) technology to create an ecosystem which solves some of the major problems with supply chain management. The platform uses two in-house tokens, VET and VTHO, to manage and create value based on its VeChainThor public blockchain. The idea is to boost the efficiency, traceability and transparency of supply chains while reducing costs and placing more control in the hands of individual users.
You can download theVeChainlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: VeChain
item.description: VeChain (VET) is a blockchain-powered supply chain platform. Begun in 2015 and launched in June 2016, VeChain aims to use distributed governance and Internet of Things (IoT) technology to create an ecosystem which solves some of the major problems with supply chain management. The platform uses two in-house tokens, VET and VTHO, to manage and create value based on its VeChainThor public blockchain. The idea is to boost the efficiency, traceability and transparency of supply chains while reducing costs and placing more control in the hands of individual users.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Zilliqa (ZIL) Logo Zilliqa is a public, permissionless blockchain that is designed to offer high throughput with the ability to complete thousands of transactions per second. It seeks to solve the issue of blockchain scalability and speed by employing sharding as a second-layer scaling solution. The platform is home to many decentralized applications, and as of October 2020, it also allows for staking and yield farming. Development work officially started on Zilliqa in June 2017, and its testnet went live in March 2018.
You can download theZilliqalogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
